thread.title: Gerardo

author: Gerardo
title: Gerardo
text: The process and the price paid through Carttrawler was great!!! We arrived at Panam√° airport (Tocumen) and we couldn't find Mex's office, because there isn't any!!! The service is provided locally by Express Rentacar but there's no sing about MEX, We spent half an hour looking for the Mex desktop. The car was in a good condition, but the air conditioning and the front axis need repair.
